attributes.action: PREVENT UNQUALIFIED ACCOUNTANTS, TAX AND FINANCIAL ADVISORS PROVIDING SERVICES UNLESS THEY HAVE PROFESSIONALLY RECOGNISED QUALIFICATIONS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lawyers must have Professional Qualifications but anyone can currently provide services calling themselves Accountants, tax or consultants etc without Qualifications. They need to be regulated. Donovan Cleary ACCA ( a Chartered and Certified Accountant)
